subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox traded away Kevin Youkilis on Sunday, sending the three-time All-Star infielder and cash to the White Sox for the utilityman Brent Lillibridge and the right-hander Zach Stewart.
snippet: The Red Sox traded away Kevin Youkilis on Sunday, sending the three-time All-Star infielder and cash to the White Sox for the utilityman Brent Lillibridge and the right-hander Zach Stewart.
